You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesC C] > &copf;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Copf;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2102/index.htm U+02102].
  * `&copf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D554.
